messages.message:
Hey, I have just enabled the new Workspaces/Hub view - this is amazing, big improvements here that customers will love :blob-clap: I have a couple of pieces of feedback though:
1. I find it annoying that the default in Workspaces is 'All workspaces' rather than 'My workspace'. I almost never use other peoples projects (maybe this is just me), so it clutters my view.
2. To create a new Build project I have to select 'Create App' (which mostly makes sense). To make a new Converse project, I have to select 'Create chatbot' (which doesn't fit with Converse vs Chatbots as I understand them). I find this quite confusing since it appears to say: Build = Create an App, Converse = Create a chatbot. The filter project options are also 'projects' and 'conversations', again different
    a. I think we just need to be clear with our messaging on the home page (Build/Converse) vs the workspace tab (apps/chatbots)

In addition to what hamish is saying, I think we should remember the last workspace someone was in and take them back there when you next come back. I find it annoying that I enter an app, come out and its forgotten which workspace I was in.
@Lee FYI you can do this from the home screen by clicking this button
cc @hannah (i would also tag jessica but sheâ€™s OOO today)
@tj.serkes @Natasha @Jianqi Xing fyi #2 is what we were discussing this morning.

CC: @avi for number 2 as well. Is the stance here converse is the build analog?

I also echo that feedback for number 1
